tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_preferences (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  theme_color VARCHAR(255),
  background_image VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE player_settings (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sound_enabled BOOLEAN,
  notifications_enabled BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customization_options (
  customization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  option_name VARCHAR(255),
  option_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE player_preferences ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  color_theme VARCHAR(20),
  background_image VARCHAR(50) )

CREATE TABLE gameplay_settings ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sound_volume INT,
  music_enabled BOOLEAN,
  controls_mapping JSONB )

CREATE TABLE character_customization ( character_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  character_name VARCHAR(50),
  outfit_color VARCHAR(20),
  accessory_equipped BOOLEAN )

CREATE TABLE leaderboard ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  score INT,
  rank INT )

CREATE TABLE notification_settings ( player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  push_notifications_enabled BOOLEAN,
  email_notifications_enabled BOOLEAN )
